english.response: On January 18, 1972, the Emirates Council was established, and Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan was elected as the first President of the UAE. The UAE has since become a federation with its own government, constitution, and laws.

arabic.response: في 18 يناير 1972، تم إنشاء المجلس الفيدرالي، وانتخب الشيخ زايد بن سلطان آل نهيان أول رئيس للولاية.
